column1: # DESCRIPTION: Promote Transmission Nodes from Orion reference tables to DataStore

column5: One to one mapping with int cast
One to one mapping with nvarchar cast
One to one mapping with nvarchar cast

column3: WHEN '1' THEN 'Internet' WHEN '2' THEN 'Electricity' WHEN '3' THEN 'Gas' WHEN '7' THEN 'Telco' ELSE NULL END AS nvarchar(11))
column5: One to one mapping with nvarchar cast

column2: FROM [schema].utl_network_node INNER JOIN [schema].utl_network ON utl_network.network_id = utl_network_node.network_id LEFT JOIN [schema].utl_network_region ON utl_network_node.region_id = utl_network_region.region_id WHERE (utl_network_node.Meta_LatestUpdate_TaskExecutionInstanceId  > @LatestSuccessfulTaskExecutionInstanceID OR utl_network.Meta_LatestUpdate_TaskExecutionInstanceId  > @LatestSuccessfulTaskExecutionInstanceID OR utl_network_region.Meta_LatestUpdate_TaskExecutionInstanceId  > @LatestSuccessfulTaskExecutionInstanceID)
